author: dreid
msg: Add a small test program for testing the new socket options code.

author: dreid
msg: Add code to allow APR to track the socket options it has set.  This
code aims to minimise the number of syscalls required to determine the
state of a socket.  The next step is to change the os_cork/os_uncork
code to use basic apr calls and hence make use of this ability.

author: bjh
msg: Get OS/2 dir & stat code working with current API.
